mapper.select: SELECT M.M_NO, C.WRITING_NO, CA.FILE_ADR, M.NICK_NM, C.CON, C.DT, C.DEL, NVL(L.LCNT, 0) AS LCNT, NVL(CC.CCNT, 0) AS CCNT,NVL(CW.WCNT,0) AS WCNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY C.WRITING_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM CRNG C INNER JOIN M M ON C.WRITER_NO = M.M_NO AND M.NICK_NM = #{nickNm} INNER JOIN (SELECT WRITING_NO, FILE_ADR, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY WRITING_NO ORDER BY ATTC_NO ASC) AS RNK FROM CRNG_ATTC) CA ON C.WRITING_NO = CA.WRITING_NO AND CA.RNK = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT WRITING_NO,NVL(count(*),0) AS WCNT FROM CRNG_ATTC GROUP BY WRITING_NO) CW ON C.WRITING_NO = CW.WRITING_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT WRITING_NO, NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS CCNT FROM CRNG_CMT GROUP BY WRITING_NO) CC ON C.WRITING_NO = CC.WRITING_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT WRITING_NO, NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS LCNT FROM LK GROUP BY WRITING_NO) L ON C.WRITING_NO = L.WRITING_NO WHERE C.DEL = 1 AND LOWER(SUBSTR(CA.FILE_ADR,INSTR(CA.FILE_ADR,'.',-1)+1)) IN('jpg','jpeg','png','gif')

SELECT M.M_NO, CS.STORY_NO, CS.STORY_TITLE, CSA.FILE_ADDR, M.NICK_NM, CS.DT, CS.DEL, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CS.STORY_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM CRNG_STORY CS INNER JOIN M M ON CS.WRITER_NO = M.M_NO AND M.NICK_NM = #{nickNm} INNER JOIN (SELECT STORY_NO, FILE_ADDR, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY STORY_NO ORDER BY ATTC_NO ASC) AS RNK FROM CRNG_STORY_ATTC) CSA ON CS.STORY_NO = CSA.STORY_NO AND CSA.RNK = 1 WHERE CS.DEL = 1

SELECT CS.STORY_NO, CS.WRITER_NO, CS.STORY_TITLE, M.M_NO ,M.M_NM, M.IMG_ADR, M.NICK_NM,CST.FILE_ADDRS, TO_CHAR(CS.DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DT FROM CRNG_STORY CS INNER JOIN M M ON CS.WRITER_NO = M.M_NO INNER JOIN (SELECT CSA.STORY_NO,SUBSTR(MAX(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(CSA.FILE_ADDR, ',')), 2) AS FILE_ADDRS FROM (SELECT STORY_NO, FILE_ADDR, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY STORY_NO ORDER BY ATTC_NO ASC) AS RNUM FROM CRNG_STORY_ATTC ORDER BY STORY_NO DESC) CSA START WITH CSA.RNUM = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR CSA.RNUM = CSA.RNUM - 1 AND PRIOR CSA.STORY_NO = CSA.STORY_NO GROUP BY CSA.STORY_NO) CST ON CST.STORY_NO=CS.STORY_NO WHERE CS.DEL = 1 AND CS.WRITER_NO = (SELECT M_NO FROM M WHERE NICK_NM = #{nickNm}) AND CS.STORY_NO = #{storyNo} ORDER BY CS.DT DESC

SELECT M.M_NO, C.WRITING_NO, CA.FILE_ADR, M.NICK_NM, C.CON, C.DT, C.DEL, NVL(L.LCNT, 0) AS LCNT, NVL(CC.CCNT, 0) AS CCNT,NVL(CW.WCNT,0) AS WCNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY C.WRITING_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM CRNG C INNER JOIN M M ON C.WRITER_NO = M.M_NO AND M.NICK_NM = #{nickNm} INNER JOIN (SELECT WRITING_NO, FILE_ADR, RANK() OVER(PARTITION BY WRITING_NO ORDER BY ATTC_NO ASC) AS RNK FROM CRNG_ATTC) CA ON C.WRITING_NO = CA.WRITING_NO AND CA.RNK = 1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT WRITING_NO,NVL(count(*),0) AS WCNT FROM CRNG_ATTC GROUP BY WRITING_NO) CW ON C.WRITING_NO = CW.WRITING_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT WRITING_NO, NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS CCNT FROM CRNG_CMT GROUP BY WRITING_NO) CC ON C.WRITING_NO = CC.WRITING_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT WRITING_NO, NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS LCNT FROM LK GROUP BY WRITING_NO) L ON C.WRITING_NO = L.WRITING_NO WHERE C.DEL = 1 AND LOWER(SUBSTR(CA.FILE_ADR,INSTR(CA.FILE_ADR,'.',-1)+1)) IN('mp4','mov')

SELECT CC.CMT_NO, CC.CMT_WRITER_NO,CC.WRITING_NO,CC.CMT_CON,M.M_NO, M.M_NM, M.NICK_NM,M.IMG_ADR, TO_CHAR(CC.DT, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY cc.WRITING_NO DESC) AS RNUM FROM CRNG_CMT CC INNER JOIN M M ON CC.CMT_WRITER_NO = M.M_NO WHERE CC.WRITING_NO= #{writingNo} ORDER BY RNUM DESC
SELECT C.WRITING_NO, C.WRITER_NO, C.CON,M.M_NO ,M.M_NM, M.IMG_ADR, M.NICK_NM from CRNG C INNER JOIN M M ON C.WRITER_NO = M_NO WHERE M.DEL=1 and M.NICK_NM=#{nickNm} and C.WRITING_NO = #{writingNo}

SELECT M.M_NO, M.IMG_ADR, M.M_NM, M.NICK_NM,M.INTRO_CON, NVL(F1.FWER,0) AS FWER,NVL(F2.FWO,0) AS FWO,NVL(PCNT,0) AS PCNT FROM M M LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT RQ_USER, COUNT(*) AS FWER FROM FOLLOW GROUP BY RQ_USER) F1 ON M.M_NO = F1.RQ_USER LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT RP_USER, NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS FWO FROM FOLLOW GROUP BY RP_USER) F2 ON M.M_NO = F2.RP_USER LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT WRITER_NO, NVL(COUNT(*),0) AS PCNT FROM CRNG WHERE DEL=1 GROUP BY WRITER_NO) C ON M.M_NO= C.WRITER_NO WHERE M.NICK_NM = #{nickNm}

SELECT M.M_NO, C.WRITING_NO, CA.FILE_ADR, M.NICK_NM, C.CON,TO_CHAR(C.DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DT, C.DEL, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY CA.ATTC_NO) AS RNUM FROM CRNG C INNER JOIN M M ON C.WRITER_NO = M.M_NO AND M.M_NO =(SELECT M_NO FROM M WHERE NICK_NM= #{nickNm}) INNER JOIN (SELECT ATTC_NO,WRITING_NO, FILE_ADR FROM CRNG_ATTC) CA ON C.WRITING_NO = CA.WRITING_NO AND CA.WRITING_NO = #{writingNo} WHERE C.DEL = 1
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) as FEXIST FROM FOLLOW WHERE RQ_USER = #{m_no} AND RP_USER = (SELECT M_NO FROM M WHERE NICK_NM=#{nickNm})
SELECT LAST_NUMBER FROM USER_SEQUENCES WHERE SEQUENCE_NAME = 'STORY_SEQ'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FOLLOW(RQ_USER,RP_USER) SELECT #{m_no}, M_NO FROM M WHERE NICK_NM = #{nickNm}
mapper.select: SELECT EMO_CAT_NO,TRIM(EMOJI) AS EMOJI FROM CRNG_EMOJI
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CRNG_CMT(WRITING_NO, CMT_WRITER_NO, CMT_CON) VALUES(#{writingNo}, #{m_no}, #{cmt_con})
mapper.update: UPDATE CRNG SET DEL = 0 WHERE WRITING_NO =#{writingNo}
